hook: They told you AmericanFireside — faith and freedom, eagle imagery was settled. It isn't.
body: Here is the truth in plain English: power follows narratives, and narratives follow courage. If we want a freer future, we have to speak clearly, act boldly, and refuse to outsource conviction.
cta: Follow AmericanFireside for fearless, faith-forward takes that actually matter.
full_script: They told you AmericanFireside — faith and freedom, eagle imagery was settled. It isn't. Here is the truth in plain English: power follows narratives, and narratives follow courage. If we want a freer future, we have to speak clearly, act boldly, and refuse to outsource conviction. Follow AmericanFireside for fearless, faith-forward takes that actually matter.
